content.value: Information for personal, non-commercial use only

You may not modify, copy, reproduce, republish, upload, post, transmit or distribute in any way any material from this Site including code and software. You must not use this Site for any purpose that is unlawful or prohibited by these terms of use.

You may not use data mining, robots, screen scraping, or similar automated data gathering, extraction or publication tools on this Site (including without limitation for the purposes of establishing, maintaining, advancing or reproducing information contained on our Site on your own website or in any other publication), except with Our prior written consent.
We care strongly about the privacy and safety of members, below is some important information relating to your privacy while using our website/services. Please read them carefully.
What information we collect and why

In order to give you the best possible experience using this site, we may collect information from your interactions with our network, such as Internet Protocol addresses, browser type, referring site, timestamps, job preferences, personal skills/attributes, contact information.
We collect personal information for several reasons, which are highlighted below;

value: Delivering core services of the website
Creating new services or improving existing services
Generating reports, insights or analytics from aggregated de-identified user data.

content.value: Your personal information will be stored using third party services and/or cloud solution providers.
Information disclosure
We do not share, sell, rent, or trade User Personal Information with third parties for commercial purposes.

We may use User Personal Information with your permission, so we can perform services you have authorized. For example, if you indicate you are looking for work, we may contact you with opportunities.

We may share User Personal Information with a limited number of third party vendors who process it on our behalf to provide or improve our service, and who have agreed to privacy restrictions similar to our own Privacy Statement.
Access to personal information

If you need a copy of your personal information, you can contact us and we can arrange for a transfer of said copy. You will also be provided with an option to not identify yourself to other members of the site.
Unsolicited communication

We may send you emails related to your account status, job preference updates, job application process status. You may unsubscribe to these services at any time if you no longer wish to be a part of them.
Misinformation

We try our best to ensure information on this site is correct,  however we can not guarantee at all times it will be. If you believe information pertaining to you on this site is incorrect you can contact us and arrange to have it corrected accordingly.
